title: Democrats Climate Plans, Trump Foreign Policy
itunes:title: Democrats Climate Plans, Trump Foreign Policy
description:
Guests: Roger Fisk, Democratic Strategist; long time Obama aide and Principal of New Day Strategy, Holly Turner, Republican Strategist and Partner at Stampede Consulting and John Gans, former Chief Speechwriter at the Pentagon and author of "White House Warriors: How the National Security Council Transformed the American Way of War."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
